confirm-marital-status.has-marital-status-changed: Has your marital status or spouse changed since you applied for the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
confirm-marital-status.help-message: The marital status we have on file can also be found on the renewal letter you received from Service Canada.

error-message.has-marital-status-changed-required: Please indicate if your marital status has changed

marital-status.marital-status: What is your current marital status?
marital-status.provide-sin: Provide the Social Insurance Number (SIN) of your current spouse or common-law partner. The information is required to calculate your adjusted family net income.
marital-status.required-information: Your spouse or common-law partner must submit their own application or renewal for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
marital-status.confirm-checkbox: I confirm that my spouse or common-law partner is aware and has agreed to share their personal information.

error-message.date-of-birth-year-required: Enter year of birth, for example 1950
error-message.yob-is-future: Year of birth must be in the past
error-message.sin-unique: The Social Insurance Number (SIN) must be unique

confirm-phone.add-phone: An up-to-date phone number helps the Government of Canada contact you if there's an issue with your renewal. You can find the number we have on file in the letter from Service Canada. If you don't provide a phone number, we'll contact you by mail.

add-or-update.legend: Would you like to update or add your phone number?

error-message.add-or-update-required: Select whether you would like to add or update your phone number

confirm-email.add-email: An up-to-date email helps the Government of Canada and Sun Life contact you regarding your Canadian Dental Care Plan coverage. You can find the email we have on file in the letter from Service Canada.

add-or-update.legend: Would you like to update or add your email address?

receive-comms.legend: Would you like to receive email communication from Sun Life and the Government of Canada?

error-message.add-or-update-required: Select whether you would like to add or update your email
error-message.email-match: The email addresses entered do not match
error-message.email-valid: Enter an email address in the correct format, such as name@example.com
error-message.confirm-email-valid: Enter confirmation of email address in the correct format, such as name@example.com
error-message.receive-comms-required: Select whether you would like to receive email communication

confirm-address.have-you-moved: Would you like to update your home or mailing address?
confirm-address.help-message: The address we have on file can also be found on the renewal letter you received from Service Canada.

error-message.has-address-changed-required: Select whether you have moved or changed your mailing address
error-message.is-home-address-same-as-mailing-address-: Select whether or not your mailing address and home address are the same

home-address.use-mailing-address: My home address is the same as my mailing address

address-field.address-note: Include apartment number (if applicable), street number, street name. For example: 4B - 123 Main St.

address-suggestion.address-selection-legend: Please select an address option below:
address-suggestion.description: We found a suggested correction for the address you entered.

address-invalid.description: The mailing address you entered appears to be invalid. Please review the details below.

mailing-address.address-required: Enter mailing address, typically number and street
mailing-address.city-required: Enter a city or town for your mailing address
mailing-address.country-required: Select a country for your mailing address
mailing-address.postal-code-required: Enter postal code or zip code for your mailing address
mailing-address.postal-code-valid: Enter mailing address postal code in the correct format, such as A1A 1A1
mailing-address.province-required: Select a province, territory, state or region for your mailing address
mailing-address.zip-code-valid: Enter mailing address zip code in the correct format, such as 12345 or 12345-6789
mailing-address.invalid-postal-code-for-country: A Canadian postal code in the mailing address was entered but Canada was not selected as the country. Please select Canada, and the proper province, or change the postal code
mailing-address.invalid-postal-code-for-province: The postal code does not match the province or territory you selected

home-address.address-required: Enter home address, typically number and street
home-address.city-required: Enter a city or town for your home address
home-address.country-required: Select a country for your home address
home-address.postal-code-required: Enter postal code or zip code for your home address
home-address.postal-code-valid: Enter home address postal code in the correct format, such as A1A 1A1
home-address.province-required: Select a province, territory, state or region for your home address
home-address.zip-code-valid: Enter home address zip code in the correct format, such as 12345 or 12345-6789
home-address.invalid-postal-code-for-country: A Canadian postal code in the home address was entered but Canada was not selected as the country. Please select Canada, and the proper province, or change the postal code
home-address.invalid-postal-code-for-province: The postal code does not match the province or territory you selected

error-message.characters-valid: Only letters, numbers and the following characters are accepted: apostrophe ('), comma (,), period (.), hyphen (-) and bracket ()

dental-insurance.title: Access to private dental insurance
dental-insurance.legend: Do you have access to private dental insurance or coverage?

list.employment: Through a parent or legal guardian's employment benefits including health and wellness accounts
list.pension: Through a parent or legal guardian's pension benefits
list.purchased: Purchased by a parent or legal guardian from an insurance or benefits company
list.professional: Through a professional or student organization

dental-insurance.option-yes: Yes, I have access to dental insurance or coverage
dental-insurance.option-no: No, I do not have access to dental insurance or coverage

additional-info.title: What does it mean to have access to private dental insurance or coverage?
additional-info.eligible: It means you do not have access to any type of dental insurance or coverage through:

eligible-list.employment-benefits: your employment benefits or a family member's employment benefits, including health and wellness accounts

organization.note: Note: If you're eligible for dental coverage through your employment benefits or through a professional or student organization, you're not eligible for CDCP. This is true even if:
organization.not-take: you decide not to take it
organization.pay-premium: you have to pay a premium for it

pension.pension-benefits: your pension benefits or a family member's pension benefits
pension.federal-provincial-territorial: this includes federal, provincial and territorial government employer pension plans

exceptions.eligible: Exception: You may be eligible for the CDCP if you're retired and:
exceptions.opted-out: you opted out of pension benefits before December 11, 2023, and
exceptions.opt-back: you can't opt back in under the pension rules

purchased-coverage.purchased-through: coverage bought by you or a family member or through a group plan from an insurance or benefits company
purchased-coverage.purchased-privately: if you purchased your current dental insurance policy privately  (and not as part of any of the coverage described above), you're not eligible for the CDCP while that coverage is in effect.

error-message.dental-insurance-required: Select whether you have access to dental insurance

confirm-dental-benefits.title: Access to other federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits
confirm-dental-benefits.access-to-dental: Access to dental coverage through a provincial, territorial or federal government social program will not impact your eligibility for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
confirm-dental-benefits.eligibility-criteria: If you meet all the eligibility criteria, your coverage will be coordinated between the plans to ensure there are no gaps or duplication in coverage.
confirm-dental-benefits.has-benefits: Do you have other dental benefits through a federal, provincial or territorial social program aside from the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
confirm-dental-benefits.option-yes: Yes, I have federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits.
confirm-dental-benefits.option-no: No, I do not have federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits.

error-message.federal-provincial-territorial-benefit-r: Select whether you have federal provincial or territorial dental benefits

update-dental-benefits.title: Access to other federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits
update-dental-benefits.access-to-dental: Access to dental coverage through a provincial, territorial or federal government social program will not impact your eligibility for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
update-dental-benefits.eligibility-criteria: If you meet all the eligibility criteria, your coverage will be coordinated between the plans to ensure there are no gaps or duplication in coverage.

federal-benefits.title: Federal benefits
federal-benefits.legend: Do you have other dental benefits through a federal, provincial or territorial social program aside from the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
federal-benefits.option-no: No, I do not have federal dental benefits

social-programs.legend: Please select which social program you are covered under. If you have more than one, please select the one you use most.

provincial-territorial-benefits.title: Provincial or territorial benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.legend: Do you have other dental benefits through a provincial or territorial social program aside from the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-yes: Yes, I have provincial or territorial dental benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-no: No, I do not have provincial or territorial dental benefits

social-programs.radio-legend: Please select which social program you are covered under. If you have more than one, please select the one you use most.

error-message.federal-benefit-program-required: Select which federal program you are covered under
error-message.federal-benefit-required: Select whether you have federal dental benefits
error-message.provincial-benefit-program-required: Select which provincial or territorial program you are covered under
error-message.provincial-benefit-required: Select whether you have provincial or territorial dental benefits

demographic-survey.improve-cdcp: Answering these questions is optional. Your answers will help Health Canada improve the Canadian Dental Care Plan and make sure our services are accessible to everyone.
demographic-survey.confidential: The information collected will only be used for statistical purposes and will be kept confidential.
demographic-survey.impact-enrollment: Your completion of the demographic questions will not impact your enrolment in the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
demographic-survey.indigenous-status: Are you First Nations, MÃ©tis or Inuk (Inuit)?
demographic-survey.disability-status: Do you indentify as someone with a disability?
demographic-survey.disability-help-message: A person with a disability is a person who has a long-term difficulty or condition, such as vision, hearing, mobility, flexibility, dexterity, pain, learning, developmental, memory or mental health-related impairments, that limit their daily activities inside or outside the home such as at school, work, or in the community in general.
demographic-survey.ethnic-groups: In our society, people are often described by their race or racial background. These are not based in science, but our race may influence the way we are treated by individuals and institutions, and this may affect our health. Which category(ies) best describes you? Check all that apply:
demographic-survey.gender-help-message: Gender refers to current gender which may be different from sex assigned at birth and may be different from what is indicated on legal documents.
